events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to return it because the size is wrong and I don't want to keep it.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund/return issue based on the message about returning the wrong size jacket.
Assigning support agent responsible for handling refund and return requests to assist the customer with their case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with your jacket return and ensure you have a smooth experience.
Could you please provide the order number and the condition of the jacket? Also, let us know if the tags are still attached.
The order number is 45213789. The jacket is unused, in perfect condition, and the tags are still attached.
We can process a full refund once the jacket has been returned. I'll send you a prepaid return shipping label to your email.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label offer and will send the jacket back tomorrow.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and to make sure everything is satisfactory with your return process.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you!
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Please take a moment to share your feedback about your support experience.
